code: import React from'react';import Fetcher from'../hooks/Fetcher';export default function MovieDescriptionView(match){var movie_id=match.match.params.id;var url='http://www.omdbapi.com/?apikey=59ecd04c&i='+movie_id;var movie=Fetcher(url);return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"full-movie-description"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"image-container"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("img",{src:movie.Poster,alt:"movie poster"})),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"description"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("h4",null,movie.Title),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("p",null,"imdb Ratings: ",movie.imdbRating),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("p",null,"Rated:        ",movie.Rated),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("p",null,"Raleased:     ",movie.Released),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("p",null,"Year:         ",movie.Year),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("p",null,"Language:     ",movie.Language),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("p",null,"Country:      ",movie.Country),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("p",null,"Duration:     ",movie.Runtime),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("p",null,"Genre:        ",movie.Genre),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("p",null,"Writer:       ",movie.Writer),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("p",null,"Actors:       ",movie.Actors),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("p",null,"Awards:       ",movie.Awards),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("p",null,"Plot:         ",movie.Plot)));};
